requiem:advancements.requiem.root.title: Requiem
requiem:advancements.requiem.good_as_new: Cure an undead body while possessing it
requiem:advancements.requiem.makeshift_m: Replace every bone of a Wither Skeleton
requiem:advancements.adventure.the_choic: Choose between an ordinary life and a bizarre eternity
requiem:advancements.requiem.piglin_sepp: Cause a zombified piglin to regret its actions
requiem:advancements.requiem.kung_fu_pan: As a panda, hit something with a wooden sword
requiem:remnant_type.requiem.mortal.name: Mortal
requiem:commands.ethereal.set.fail.morta: Failed to make %s ethereal as they are Mortal
requiem:commands.ethereal.set.target: Your ethereal state has been updated to %s
requiem:commands.remnant.set.target: Your remnant state has been updated to %s
requiem:commands.possession.start.fail.n: %s cannot be possessed as it is not a mob entity
requiem:commands.shell.split.fail.mortal: Failed to split %s as they are Mortal
requiem:commands.shell.split.fail.vagran: Failed to split %s as they are already Vagrant
requiem:commands.soul.set.fail.permanent: %s cannot have a soul of its own
requiem:dialogue.first_contact.introduct: You hear a voice talking to you, but you can't quite put your finger on where it's coming from.
I do not want anything to do with this.
requiem:dialogue.first_contact.explanati: Reject your humanity, and become cursed with eternity. Refuse, and keep to your ordinary lives among others. This is an opportunity to get a whole new experience when you die, but taking it means changing your habits.
requiem:dialogue.first_contact.intereste: If you follow this path, you will have to find a new body each time you die. The powers you acquire will be of great use when that happen, and the bodies you find may well be more interesting than the standard human body you are used to.
requiem:dialogue.first_contact.disintere: If you follow this path, you will miss on everything Requiem has to offer. You will respawn as usual, and be able to play as a human right after dying.
requiem:dialogue.first_contact.very_inte: Are you sure you want to become a demon?
requiem:dialogue.first_contact.very_disi: Are you sure you want to stay human?
config.requiem.title: Requiem Config Menu
config.requiem.more_info: Requiem can be configured through %1$s and %2$s. For more information on the various options available, consider visiting %3$s.
config.requiem.more_info.official_doc: the official documentation on the Ladysnake website
death.attack.requiem.mortal_dysmorphia: The soul of %1$s did not belong in the body of %2$s.
gamerule.requiem:showPossessorNameTag.de: Show the nameplates of players possessing entities
gamerule.requiem:disableCure.description: Remove the ability to cure players possessing undeads
gamerule.requiem:startingRemnantType.des: Replaces the choice at first death between demon and mortal
gamerule.requiem:possessionDetection.des: Mobs detect possessed comrades under some circumstances
requiem:possess.incompatible_body: This body is incompatible with your soul
origins:layer.requiem.soul_type.name: Soul Type
origins:layer.requiem.soul_type.missing_: You do not have a Soul Type.
origins:origin.requiem.mortal.name: Mortal
origins:origin.requiem.mortal.descriptio: A mere mortal. Your ordinary Minecraft experience awaits.
origins:origin.requiem.remnant.name: Demon
origins:origin.requiem.remnant.descripti: Tales have been told of mysterious demons taking over the bodies of the dead. No one really knows what they are, but few really want to find out.
origins:origin.requiem.vagrant.name: Vagrant
origins:origin.requiem.vagrant.descripti: A demon outside of a congruous body. Condemned to wander and take over weaker entities to act as proxies with the physical world.
origins:power.requiem.remnant.name: Dissociation
origins:power.requiem.remnant.descriptio: When you die, your soul dissociates from your body, becoming a wandering ghost.
origins:power.requiem.damned.name: Damned
origins:power.requiem.damned.description: Your only way to get a new human body is to get cured while possessing a suitable creature.
origins:power.requiem.freeform.name: Freeform
origins:power.requiem.freeform.descripti: Ghosts can move through the air and, with a bit of effort, even through walls.
origins:power.requiem.possession.name: Possession
origins:power.requiem.possession.descrip: As a free soul, you may take over the empty bodies that roam this world.
origins:power.requiem.resurrection.name: Death Grip
origins:power.requiem.resurrection.descr: Under some circumstances, your soul may hold on to your disfigured body after its death.
origins:power.requiem.soul_mending.name: Soul Mending
origins:power.requiem.soul_mending.descr: Your soul slowly mends itself during possession.
origins:power.requiem.banished.name: Banished
origins:power.requiem.banished.descripti: You cannot get a new human body by curing other creatures.
origins:power.requiem.mortal.name: Respawn
origins:power.requiem.mortal.description: When you die, and if all goes well, you find yourself at your last resting point with a whole new body.
requiem.message.peaceful_despawn: This host may not belong to such a peaceful world
